name: Cuts Ice Ltd
goal:
Cuts Ice was founded to create exceptional tasting, high-quality e-liquids that inspire smokers to make better choices.

We are committed to promoting and improving vaping product research, development, and quality, to set the standard for the best possible alternative to conventional tobacco and ensure every smoker has the opportunity to switch to a significantly less harmful alternative.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- Tobacco Products Directive
- Excise
- Chemical regulation
- Smoking cessation
